Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Because ideal lipid targets were not reached ( low - density lipoprotein ( LDL ) cholesterol less than 130 mg / dl , high - density lipoprotein ( HDL ) cholesterol greater than 35 mg / dl , or total cholesterol / HDL cholesterol less than 4 . 5 mg / dl ) with diet plus a single drug , gemfibrozil ( 1 . 2 g / day ) - lovastatin ( primarily 20 or 40 mg ) treatment was given .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| High LDL cholesterol (LDL cholesterol greater than 130 mg / dl) |
| Low HDL cholesterol (HDL cholesterol less than 35 mg / dl) |
| High total cholesterol / HDL cholesterol ratio (total cholesterol / HDL cholesterol greater than 4.5 mg / dl) |

| Low HDL cholesterol (HDL cholesterol less than 35 mg / dl) |
| High total cholesterol / HDL cholesterol ratio (total cholesterol / HDL cholesterol greater than 4.5 mg / dl) |

These entities are clearly referring to health conditions or diseases as they describe abnormal levels of LDL and HDL cholesterol and an unfavorable ratio of total cholesterol to HDL cholesterol.
